oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Baḥr al-jawāhir : manuscript, 1767
Baḥr al-jawāhir
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Harawī, Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf , active 16th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Gibb, H. A. R. (Hamilton Alexander Rosskeen) , 1895-1971 (former owner.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم وبه ثقتي حمد العلام اجدي ذوي الافهام بتحقيق دقايق اللغات ... :Incipit
Written in one column, 18 lines per page, in black rubricated and punctuated in red. Comments in the margins.
Copy probably completed on 20 Shawwāl 1180 AH [March 21, 1767 AD].
Ownership statement and seal by Ibrāhīm ibn al-Shaykh Ḥusayn ibn al-Shaykh ʻAbbās al-Balāghī al-Najafī (f. 1v).
MS Arab 424. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
